site.title: Francesco Coniglione
site.welcome: Hi, I'm Francesco — I make data make sense.
site.tagline: A data scientist based in Ontario.
site.intro: I solve problems through the use of innovative technologies and secure, efficient architectures.

form.thankYou: Thank you! I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

contact.blurb: I'm always interested in discussing data, machine learning, or new opportunities. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to connect.

about.paragraph1: I am a Data Scientist and lifelong learner with a background that spans healthcare, education, and finance. Having worked as both a banker and a pharmacy assistant, I bring a unique perspective to data—I don't just see numbers, I see the people and business needs behind them.
about.paragraph2: With a strong foundation in the software development process, I focus on bridging the gap between technical theory and practical application. I specialize in building clean, scalable code and developing machine learning models that solve genuine problems and drive growth.

ai-web-agent.description: An AI agent powered by the Google Gemini API that fills out web forms for testing purposes through a working agentic loop.

debt-approval-cli.description: A command-line interface tool that provides debt approval estimates using a model trained on LendingClub data.

finley.description: Your finance buddy that leverages predictive analytics to provide personalized net worth insights.

ceasar.description: A CRM system optimized for data-driven customer interactions and streamlined workflow management.

finrisk.description: A predictive machine learning model designed to identify corporate bankruptcy risks with ~85% accuracy.

musomania.description: A social platform for musicians, built with a scalable backend to support collaboration and monetization.
